thread.title: Bryan Cranston wants to play supervillain
thread.title_full: Bryan Cranston wants to play supervillain

author: Zainab Mulla | Indo-Asian News Service
title: Bryan Cranston wants to play supervillain
text:
Bryan Cranston wants to play supervillain By Indo-Asian News Service on October 11, 2015 at 4:09 PM Comments 
Los Angeles, Oct 11: “Breaking Bad” actor Bryan Cranston says he would really love to dig up his bad side in a classic Marvel film. ”You know what I’d like to do? I’d like to do some big superhero villain in some Marvel classic,” Cranston was quoted as saying by metro.co.uk. However, he wanted the character made from scratch and not taken from existing comic books, reports aceshowbiz.com. (Read: Bryan Cranstom and Julia Louis Dreyfus make-out at the Emmys) 
“I don’t know what I would do, but it would be nasty,” he said. Marvel has some openings for the mentioned role. The studio had announced several superhero films which are yet to cast the villains. The upcoming films are “Ant-Man and the Wasp”, “Captain Marvel” and “Black Panther”. 
  4:09 PM Topics:
